page.title: 03HEALTH SERVICES
page.content: The{doctors' surgery}is housed at 7,South Avenue,Ullesthorpe.The partneship is shared by Dr.E.J.H Byrne and Dr.J.K.Oldring.Surgeries are held in the mornings and evenings on most days. There are no other medical facilities available in the area,and all cases other than those dealt with a General Proctitioner would be referred to Lutterworth ,Hinckley,Rugby or Leicester.{The {nearest dental surgery}is also in Lutterworth. Many of the local children were either born in Rugby St.Cross Hospital or Leicester Royal Infirmary.
